location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paper.Dimensions: 645 x 861mm, on sheet 749 x 979mm.

mods.abstract: Map depicting the northern and north-western parts of the Arabian Peninsula, as well as the surrounding region. The map indicates hydrology, boundaries, settlements, routes and railway lines, as well as providing some indication of relief in the form of hachures.
